languages.text: "Я изучил нескольких погибших с подобными травмами. Органы чувств были удалены путем термического влияния концентрированного светового излучения. Взятые из ран образцы тканей демонстрируют склонность к противоестественным, невозможным мутациям, отрицающим законы, сформулированные Магос Биологис".

"I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."
languages.original_text: "Я изучил нескольких погибших с подобными травмами. Органы чувств были удалены путем термического влияния концентрированного светового излучения. Взятые из ран образцы тканей демонстрируют склонность к противоестественным, невозможным мутациям, отрицающим законы, сформулированные Магос Биологис".

traits.locale_text: "I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence applied using concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

"I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence applied using concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

"I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

languages.text: "Ich habe verschiedene Verstorbene mit ähnlichen Verletzungen studiert. Ihre sensorischen Organe wurden mittels thermalem Einfluss durch konzentrierte Lichtstrahlen entfernt. Die Gewebeproben aus den Wunden zeigen eine Prädisposition für unnatürliche, unmögliche Mutationen, die den von den Magos Biologis formulierten Gesetzen widersprechen."
languages.original_text: "I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe verschiedene Verstorbene mit ähnlichen Verletzungen studiert. Ihre sensorischen Organe wurden mittels thermalem Einfluss durch konzentrierte Lichtstrahlen entfernt. Die Gewebeproben aus den Wunden zeigen eine Prädisposition für unnatürliche, unmögliche Mutationen, die den von den Magos Biologis formulierten Gesetzen widersprechen."

languages.text: « J'ai étudié plusieurs cadavres portant des blessures similaires. Leurs organes sensoriels avaient été retirés par des rayons thermiques de lumière concentrée. Les échantillons de tissus prélevés sur les blessures ont montré une prédisposition pour le surnaturel, des mutations impossibles qui défient les lois stipulées par le Magos Biologis. »
languages.original_text: "I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai étudié plusieurs cadavres portant des blessures similaires. Leurs organes sensoriels avaient été retirés par des rayons thermiques de lumière concentrée. Les échantillons de tissus prélevés sur les blessures ont montré une prédisposition pour le surnaturel, des mutations impossibles qui défient les lois stipulées par le Magos Biologis. »

languages.text: “我研究过几位带有类似伤害的死者，那些人的感知器官受到了某种集中光束的灼烧，被彻底移除。从伤口中取得的组织样本中，带有某种非自然的、原本不可能发生的突变倾向，这种突变违背了生物贤者阐述的法则。”
languages.original_text: "I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

traits.locale_text: “我研究过几位带有类似伤害的死者，那些人的感知器官受到了某种集中光束的灼烧，被彻底移除。从伤口中取得的组织样本中，带有某种非自然的、原本不可能发生的突变倾向，这种突变违背了生物贤者阐述的法则。”

languages.text: 「同様の傷を負った死人を何件か調べたことがある。遺体の感覚器官は収束光線による熱の影響で取り除かれていた。傷から得られた組織検体を調べたところ、不自然かつあり得ない変異が見られた。生物学賢人によって公式化された法則から外れている」
languages.original_text: "I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

traits.locale_text: 「同様の傷を負った死人を何件か調べたことがある。遺体の感覚器官は収束光線による熱の影響で取り除かれていた。傷から得られた組織検体を調べたところ、不自然かつあり得ない変異が見られた。生物学賢人によって公式化された法則から外れている」

languages.text: «He estudiado a varios individuos fallecidos con lesiones similares. Se eliminaron sus órganos sensoriales mediante el efecto térmico de haces de luz concentrados. Las muestras de tejido obtenidas de las heridas han demostrado una predisposición a mutaciones antinaturales, imposibles, que desafían las leyes formuladas por los Magos Biologis».
languages.original_text: "I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

traits.locale_text: «He estudiado a varios individuos fallecidos con lesiones similares. Se eliminaron sus órganos sensoriales mediante el efecto térmico de haces de luz concentrados. Las muestras de tejido obtenidas de las heridas han demostrado una predisposición a mutaciones antinaturales, imposibles, que desafían las leyes formuladas por los Magos Biologis».

languages.text: "Benzer yaralara sahip birkaç ölüyü inceledim. Duyu organları, odaklanmış ışık huzmelerinin ısısıyla yok edilmiş. Yaralardan elde edilen doku örnekleri, Magos Biyologis tarafından formüle edilen yasalara meydan okuyan, doğal olmayan, imkânsız mutasyonlara karşı yatkınlık sergiliyor."
languages.original_text: "I have studied several deceased individuals with similar injuries. Their sensory organs were removed by means of thermal influence of concentrated light beams. The tissue samples obtained from the wounds have demonstrated a predisposition toward unnatural, impossible mutations that defy the laws formulated by the Magos Biologis."

traits.locale_text: "Benzer yaralara sahip birkaç ölüyü inceledim. Duyu organları, odaklanmış ışık huzmelerinin ısısıyla yok edilmiş. Yaralardan elde edilen doku örnekleri, Magos Biologis tarafından formüle edilen yasalara meydan okuyan, doğal olmayan, imkânsız mutasyonlara karşı yatkınlık sergiliyor."
